interesting points: The sighting involved a red glowing object with no sound and random motions, including distinct turns, over the ground near Columbus, New Mexico.
The observers were noted to be inexperienced, and the need for caution regarding potential adverse public publicity was highlighted in the report.

An event was mentioned where alleged UFOs were observed rising out of a volcanic crater near the Mexican border, raising the possibility of reactivation of the volcanic site in connection with the sightings.
A theater owner from Las Cruces, New Mexico, aged 37, witnessed the strong broken clouds at the time of the sighting.
